content: if you ve been looking to dip your toes into a simple colorwork project how about trying this cozy knit hat created in perfectly curated shades of caron colorama o go you ll stitch this hat in a fair isle pattern with simple knit and purl techniques for a pretty fading shades effect pattern offers 2 colorways but this topper is attractive in any color that reflects your individual style materials set of 4 sizes u s 9 5 5 mm and u s 10 6 mm double-pointed knitting needles
